domain.board.contracts

Interface IReadOnlyBoard

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDeepClonable<IBoard>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBoard
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Board, ReadOnlyBoard

    public interface IReadOnlyBoard
extends IDeepClonable<IBoard>
    Represents a read-only version of an IBoard.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.HashMap<Location,IPiece> getPlayerPieces(Player player)
      Returns a lookup table of IPieces of the given Player by Location.
      IBoardSize getSize()
      Returns the IBoardSize of this IBoard.
      IReadOnlySquare getSquare(Location location)
      Returns a read-only version of the ISquare in the given Location.
      boolean isLocationFree(Location target)
      Returns true if the given Location does not containa IPiece, false otherwise.
      boolean isLocationOccupiedBy(Player occupant, Location target)
      Returns true if the given Location is occupied by an IPiece of the given Player.
      boolean isValidMove(LocationPair pair)
      Returns true if an IPiece can move on this IBoard along the given LocationPair, false otherwise.

      • Methods inherited from interface common.IDeepClonable
